articles.title: A Trump-Biden rematch? Pass, says this group searching for a third-party option in 2024
articles.description: The bipartisan group No Labels is pushing to give voters a third-party alternative to Joe Biden and Donald Trump in the 2024 presidential election.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON – A rematch between Joe Biden and Donald Trump?
No thanks, a majority of voters have said in poll after poll after poll.
But what if there was an alternative?
Elections are, after all, all about choices.
